content:
@Oliver Egger now that I have the FHIR Core tests passing, I'd like to get back to your series of PRs. (not before time, sorry).

Can we update those to run the tests again?
@Grahame Grieve yes I can rebase each pull request to current master. should I do that now or when would be a good time for doing that?
now. I have no plans for big changes, only bug fixes, and the tests are all passing
